text: @NPSOfficial_KE @APSKenya @DCI_Kenya @KTNNewsKE @CapitalFMKenya @StandardKenya @TheStarKenya @citizentvkenya @Kiss100kenya @GhettoRadio895 Other countries are sending 800euros to their citizens monthly so  they don't Starve but stay isolated and prevent this Covid-19  from spreading....What about Kenya? Is the gov't doing smthn about the citizens so that they'll have no reason to get out and get exposure to Corona?

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
